Fairview Cottage,' a newly renovated 800 square foot classic beachfront cottage, is the perfect escape from everyday life!  Offering panoramic water views & direct beach access, this property is the ideal location for a summer get-away with friends and family, or a romantic couples retreat. Wake up to a stunning sunrise, and enjoy your morning coffee on the expansive mahogany deck overlooking the Sakonnet River. This 375 square foot deck is great for sun bathing, reading and relaxing on the lounge furniture and for evening dining and cocktails!  The sprawling beachfront offers an abundance of sea glass and beautiful shells to add to your collection. Being so close to the water's edge, you can truly enjoy the wild life on the river. You will frequently see ducks, herons and the occasional swan!  Painted wood walls, vaulted ceilings and exposed wooden beams promote a cozy cottage atmosphere. The new furnishings and white color palate provides a 'barefoot elegance' that will allow you to unwind in a comfortable yet sophisticated space.  Cook a delicious meal in the newly appointed custom kitchen. Designed with stainless steel appliances, farmers sink and convenient island to feel like your home away from home when preparing a family meal or dinner for two.  The open floor plan allows for entertaining and fun family meals. Guests can comfortably lounge in the living room, dine at the banquette or cuddle up on the couch to watch a surround sound movie on the 65 inch flat screen TV.  There are (2) bedrooms located off of the main living area. Bedroom (1) has a king size bed, walk-in closet, laundry and great morning and afternoon sunlight. Bedroom (2) has a queen size bed with amazing southern water views, a chair for lounging and a cabinet for clothing storage. All bedding is provided and is luxury hotel quality. There is also the option of a air mattress for additional guests upon request.  There is (1) Cottage Style bathroom with a vessel sink, shower and bath tub in one, plenty of storage and a large mirror. Enjoy an outdoor shower after a day of swimming or sun bathing. Towels are provided.  If you are looking to go out for a night on the town, Newport is a short 15 minute drive and offers an amazing variety of activities, dining experiences and entertainment to boot!     LOCATION ::  321 Fairview Ln Portsmouth, RI 02871

A one-of-kind experience in the heart of Downtown Providence, this one bedroom, loft-style apartment sits directly across the street from the Providence Performing Arts Center (PPAC), and is like no other space in the city. Nice size bedroom with a luscious queen size bed with exquisite linens and pillows.  Ideal for two people, but can fit a third. Incredible view of the Providence Performing Arts Center, and within walking distance to almost every great restaurant in the city. Our apartment is LITERALLY across the street from the historic and amazing Providence Performing Arts Center (PPAC), with a night-time view like no other space in the city. Summer Vacation House - available June 27-August 15 ($2,600/week - Sat. change over day).       Discount rates before and after those dates. Not be missed - ideal location in Narragansett, RI.   New Kitchen with computer on fridge, remodeled baths on main level, Great Room, outdoor shower, furnished deck.  5 Bedrooms (3-2nd floor, 2-1st floor).  This very spacious house is within a short drive of four (4) beautiful Rhode Island Beaches: â¢	Scarborough State Beach - popular and well known - 2 miles east â¢	Salty Brine (Galilee) State Beach - white sandy beach - 4 miles south  â¢	Roger Wheeler's (Sand Hill /Cove) State Beach -  a family beach - 4 miles south  â¢	Narragansett Town Beach - classic New England saltwater coastal beach - 4 miles north  Enjoy the sounds of the surf, the clean sand, looking for sea glass, jumping the waves and the nearby snack shacks.  Beach items are provided at the house for your use (cart, beach chairs, sand mat, umbrella, and cooler).  Just pack up and go, so you have more time to enjoy the beach of your choice.    Donât forget the other area amenities; kayaking, paddle-boarding, fishing, golf, trail walking, bicycling, etc. Dining options are numerous, our favorite area is Boon Street.  We recommend pizza form the Bike Stop Cafe and Crazy Burger for a veggie experience.  For seafood try the Coast Guard House or Matunuck Oyster Bar. Newport, RI is less than 20 miles away with its famous Cliff Walk and eclectic shops. Donât forget a trip on the Block Island Ferry out of Point Judith, less than a 5 minute drive. This is the ideal location!  After returning to the house from your day-long adventure, get the sand off in the enclosed outdoor shower (hot/cold water) behind the house. Relax on the outdoor deck in comfy lounge furniture and feel the ocean breeze.  Enjoy outdoor grilling and eating at the outdoor table/ chairs.  Take a short walk to the Point Judith Pond waterfront and watch the sunset.  Nice neighborhood, quiet, private.  Just bring (or locally rent) the towels and linens, everything else is here for you. Your completely furnished home has central AC when needed, or try the open windows and ceiling fans.  The stone driveway allows ample parking for 5+ vehicles with side entry to newly renovated kitchen.  Enjoy the kitchenâs new high-end appliances; including a refrigerator with a touch screen computer, wine cooler, breakfast bar seating and adjacent dining area. The house front entry opens to the Great Room (2-1/2 story) with a full height stone wall and large screen TV at its base.  Ample lounge seating is flanked by a bar set-up next to open living room.  Game night can be held at the large dining room table.  With seating for 10+ it is perfect for large group gatherings, with easy access to the kitchen and breakfast bar outfitted with 5 bar chairs.  Easy internet sign-in access .  Two bedrooms/two bathrooms and laundry room occupy additional space on the first floor: â¢	A large combo bedroom/living room is accessed through a barn-door slider off the dining room. The queen bed, single sleeper pullout/sofa and queen-ann chairs provide comfort.  The combo room has a 2nd large screen tv, providing a relaxing space in the evening or on a rainy day.  The room can be closed off for privacy.  The combo room has a wall-of-windows on 2-sides with a slider door to the upper deck on a 3rd side. â¢	An accordion door at the side of the combo room leads to a full bath (shower), which can be closed off from the washer/dryer (large capacity).  The room is newly remodeled with windows that overlook the back yard and undeveloped property.  â¢	The first floor master bedroom (queen) has access to the en-suite bath/shower, and large walk-in closet.  The two 2 full length windows and white wicker furniture keep the room bright and cherry. â¢	The bath/shower also has a second access door to the main dining area on the first floor.   An open stairway leads to three (3) private bedrooms on the 2nd floor and a hallway accessible full bath with tub/shower:   â¢	Master bedroom (queen) on 2nd floor with large open floor area, one full length window and one half window over seating bench.   â¢	Newly remodeled loft bedroom (queen) with high ceiling, wide closet and lots of natural light.   â¢	Freshly painted yellow bedroom (double) with vintage dresser, full closet and full length window.  Comfortable bedding with protective covers, comforters and fluffy pillows.  Linens (sheet sets/pillowcases & towels) are the responsibility of the renter; linens can be 'rented' locally for the week (e.g. www.vacationhouselinens.com).  Bedding allows for 11 persons total.

This two-bedroom apartment is on the ground floor in an owner-occupied two-family.  Rent includes heat, hot water, and trash. All you have to pay is electricity. Recently renovated in 2016, this apartment has all hardwood floors, gorgeous new stainless steel appliances, and granite countertops.  Has washer and dryer hookup in the unit. You have to walk down a flight of stairs to get to the front door. The house is on a large fenced-in lot.  There is only one off-street parking spot, but we could squeeze in a second car in the event of a snowstorm where you canât park on the street.  Please no dogs, we would consider a cat.  Absolutely no smoking in the apartment.   A little about us!  We have four kids that are all home most days, so this apartment is not suitable for people that work nights. We also have a pug that is very friendly who would be out in the yard at times.  Please email me with a little about yourself and your phone number so we can arrange a time for a phone interview. This is a very unique private apartment. Prospective tenants will be required to undergo a criminal background and credit check for $45 per adult that will be on the lease.  Lease period is 1 year. References are required and will be checked. Rent is $1400 plus a security deposit of $1400.

NEWLY RENOVATED 4 bed, 2 bath Townhouse style apartment on the East Side! Come discover the unparalleled elegance of luxury loft living at ALCO, the latest addition to The US Rubber Lofts in Providence!   These beautiful 1 - 4 bedroom loft apartments feature sleek modern kitchens, exposed brick and beams, vaulted ceilings and designer finishes throughout, including gas fireplaces in select units! Harbor Village At The Commons offers its residents the unique opportunity to live in a premier vacation destination in the desirable South County area of Rhode Island.  We are a short drive to some of the most picturesque beaches in all of New England.  Floorplans include both one and two bedroom apartments and come newly renovated with granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, new kitchen flooring, and cherry cabinets. In addition, each apartments features a washer and dryer, central air conditioning, garbage disposal, and spacious walk in closets.  The community itself is situated on professionally landscaped grounds and features a dog park, an outdoor resort-style pool, and community clubhouse, which offers all of our residents a tanning salon, business center, and a 24 hour fitness center. Two bedroom with a den/office that could be used as a guest room.Move into this lovely spacious apartment for the holidays. Traditionally detailed, New England style with modern kitchen and bathroom. Large open floor plan with hardwood floors. Working fireplace. Can be semi furnished or fully furnished. Quiet traditional neighborhood. A great space with a lot of room, spacious.  *CERTIFIED LEAD FREE  - Bathroom-Large Jetted Bathtub or Jacuzzi bathtub.
